name: TNAF-Three Nights At Freddy's
description:
Hello and Welcome to Freddy Fazbears Pizza were adults and children can have fun! But at night these friendly characters come to life and roam the pizzeria!! Updates: V0.1 - GAME RELEASED!!! Rules: 1. Check the Camera

                                                                              2. Charge the Music Box 

                                                                              3. Close the door if someone is there 

                                                                             4. Be Safe   

                                                                              5. Have Fun!

Thanks to Scott Cawthon for FNAF Thanks to MrMonster18 for sounds WHAT TO DO IF THERE ARE GLITCHES: 1.There is a glitch were you cant click the new game or continue button - just restart the project or SPAM click it 2. There is a glitch were the power button doesn't appear - JUST DEAL WITH IT or restart the project

This is a FNAF fan game

Made by  RealFnafBro21
